backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor canister with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence items mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of various frontend components, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions and global styles for colors, borders, and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with three routes wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/MorshidButton.ts: Custom button wrapper enforcing rounded corners and hover shadows.
frontend/src/components/MorshidCard.tsx: Custom card wrapper providing white background, shadow, rounded corners, and optional top border color.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer showing branding, contact info, and Caffeine attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with navigation links that highlight active routes in #25D366.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFloating: Floating WhatsApp button with green background and hover scaling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing backend actor instances based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus MORSHID brand color variables and global button styling.
frontend/src/layouts/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main site layout with a header, footer, routed content outlet, and a floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the Contact page with WhatsApp, email, and location cards plus a response-time note.
frontend/src/pages/ForFarmersPage.tsx: Implements the For Farmers page with a hero section, service cards, and FAQ content using custom UI components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the Home page hero and feature sections highlighting MORSHID services with styled cards and CTAs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme settings, custom colors, animations, and plugin integrations for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, requirements, scope updates, known issues, and architectural constraints.
